EmailTemplate.description: Notification sent to the running User when a GRAX Schedule process finishes
EmailTemplate.name: GRAX Schedule Process Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: GRAX Schedule Process Has Finished
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!User.FirstName},
The GRAX Schedule Process, [[GRAX_Backup_Summary_Name]], has completed. Please find below a summary of your results:
Link: [[GRAX_Backup_Summary_Link]]
